verses.verse: Redeemed! how I love to proclaim it! Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb; Redeemed through His infinite mercy, His child, and forever, I am.
verses.refrain: Redeemed, (Redeemed), redeemed, (Redeemed), Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb; Redeemed, (Redeemed), redeemed, (Redeemed), His child, and forever, I am.
verses.verse: Redeemed! and so happy in Jesus! No language my rapture can tell; I know that the light of His presence With me doth continually dwell.
I know there's a crown that is waiting In yonder bright mansion for me; And soon, with the saints made perfect, At home with the Lord I shall be.
